price: (27) And We have certainly presented for the people in this Qur’ān from every [kind of] example - that they might remember.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ضَرَبۡنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walaqad ḍarabnā lilnnāsi fī hādhā al-qur'āni min kulli mathalin laʿallahum yatadhakkarūna
